snippet: If past seasons are any indication, this year’s Knicks team  may be headed for good things come April.
abstract: New York Knicks may be headed for good things if past seasons are any indication; went 5-0 at start of 1969-1970 season before winning NBA Finals and finished 1993-1994 season, when team won their first seven games, with a 57-25 record.

byline.original: By JAY SCHREIBER and NATE TAYLOR

lead_paragraph: If past seasons are any indication, this year’s Knicks team  may be headed for good things come April.

headline.seo: For the Knicks, Excellent Starts Have Proved to Be Good Omens
headline.main: For the Knicks, Excellent Starts Have Proved to Be Good Omens
